name: DungeonRush (Valkoy, Thuleanx)
description:
Welcome to our first game. 

A shooter where you are confined to only one room. Everything is pretty self-explanatory.

We hope you enjoy,

Valkoy + Thuleanx

Thanks to the people who made the sprites and sound effects.

Tileset:  https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Decorations: https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack

Sounds all from:  https://freesound.org/

And the bullet sprites: https://opengameart.org/content/bullet-collection-1-m484
